resources.string: This app is a human effort and it was developed with the best intentions. Any mistake in the content is undeliberate and due to sheer humanness. However, if you notice any mistake or errors please notify us and we will resolve it at the earliest.

The text of this app is obtained from Tanzil.net while the audio recitations come from Versebyversequran.com. We do not claim the content or recitation and all the rights to them belong to the original owners.
Metallic cases or magnetic closure may cause interferences
Compulsory stop – Otherwise meaning is changed
Should stop – End of a sentence
Must continue, can take a breath
Must continue, can take a breath
Must continue, can take a breath
Stop at the first or the second but not at both
Better to stop but permissible to continue
Better to continue but permissible to stop
It is better not to stop
